UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the DineHub application, who can be a customer or a staff member.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

role.description: The role of the user, determining their permissions.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. Access is restricted: users can read/write their own profile. Staff can read client profiles.
